item.description:
This is our "Remember When" dance!

Tonight we turn back the hands of time! Dress as you did in the 80's, 70's or 60's, basically the decade when you started going out.

A fun dance at Daniels Hall, Rt 4, Nottingham, NH., where single people meet and dance in a non threatening environment. Very inexpensive, no need to purchase expensive drinks or tip bartenders, bring your own liquor, non alcoholic drinks can be purchased or bring your own and enjoy a fun evening for singles over 30. Join us and meet that special person. Safe place for women attending alone. Visit our web site for more info and directions or call [masked] for verbal directions.

Again, no need to buy expensive drinks or tip bartenders, just bring your own liquor, free drink set-ups and hot buffet are included in the $11 admission. Casual dress is a plus which puts people at ease and makes it easier to join in the fun atmosphere. This dance has been working it's magic for 15 years. Heavy advertising means there are always new singles to meet.

Dave McDermott
"At Daniels Hall your family!"
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess where the meetup tables are located.

group.name: Find someone new this Friday! Ages 30 to 60.

item.name: Remember When Singles Dance.
